text: i've spotted an error in the API documentation. anyone know how to submit corrections?
does anyone know if a contact and company can have the same record id?
we have contacts with a "SPID" field and an associated company with the same "SPID" field
each company only has one primary contact
ideally we'd have the company and the contact both use the SPID as their record ID

For future reference, and and jordan talked about this over DM but thought I would share here as well.

They definitely can't have the same hs_object_id but they (2 different object types) can have the same unique property value.
If you set a field as a unique property you can then use that property to pull them using the api instead of hs_object_id
but you could only have one contact at a time with a particular SPID
Could someone in <#C22PU4LV8|general> help me out with my inquiry? See message above.
